Title: The Skeleton Key
Overview: A hospice nurse working at a spooky New Orleans plantation home finds herself entangled in a mystery involving the house's dark past.
production_companies: Universal Pictures, MFPV Film, Double Feature Films, ShadowCatcher Entertainment, Daniel Bobker Productions, Brick Dust Productions LLC
Cast: Kate Hudson, Gena Rowlands, Peter Sarsgaard
